body:
hi. I doubt anyone remember me but oh well. I first joined on my account that I can't get into: https://avicus.net/f1mclarenf1
That was about 4 years ago on the ip mcwalls.net I believe. Anyways I just wanted to say thanks to y'all that made it fun to play on this server and everything. Really enjoyed my time on here and I hope to see you all on Zildith later.
